Annual statistics of Common Crawl robots.txt archives

Statistics of Common Crawlâ€™s web archives on robots.txt files:

  • Overview - Number of parsed documents, Capture times, Distribution of HTTP status codes
  • Basic statistics - Average content length (file size), Average crawl delay, Average number of lines, user agents and sitemaps
  • Top user agents - most frequently used product tokens over the years
  • User agent bias - Number of disallow all instructions per user agent over the years, Average number of allow and disallow instructions per user agent over the years; overall and per website category
  • Resources - Dataset of extracted sitemap links; overall and per website category

This project is maintained by michaeldinzinger
